12.eng-name: The Book of The At-Tatbiq (Clasping One's Hands Together)

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Anas bin Malik said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) prayed (saying the) Qunut after bowing for a month, supplicating against Ri'l, Dhakwan and 'Usayyah who had disobeyed Allah and His Messenger." (Sahih)
